val:
In 2017, Jong Hyun from famous K-pop idol group SHINee commited suicide at the age of 26 and in 2019, famous South Korena celebrity Sulli and K-pop idol Hara Goo killed themselves at the age of 25 and 28. Hate comments on their social media was the cause of the death. They were suffering from it and been seeing psychiatrist to overcome but contant attack killed them.
As a South Korean who grew up consuming their music and TV show, sudden death of popular celebrities was shocking. Everyone was shocked by this tragedies.

For the nerds and tool-lovers:

  • Writing: Notion, Hemingway, Grammarly
  • Coding: Visual studio code
  • Design: Figma
  • Other: Google, Stack overflow and sometimes my

Tech stack:

  • Gatsby
  • Netlify
  • Github (source code)

Design took around ~10 hours.

Development took around ~50 hours.

Writing, interpreting, listening, grammar and spelling corrections time took me approximately 30-40 hours.

Please contact me on twitter for any questions, corrections, suggestions or any other *-tions.

The fonts on this website are Made Canvas and Abhaya Libre.
